Title: SolidQ Captcha Asp Net and SharePoint Control
Description: SolidQ Captcha Asp Net and SharePoint Control is a new way to validate forms. Is based on human perception to distinguish colors. The user select the correct color and drag and drop it to the validation area. It's developed in asp.net, vb.net, jQuery and Ajax.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SolidQ Captcha Asp Net and SharePoint Control is a new way to validate forms. Is based on human perception to distinguish colors. The user select the correct color and drag and drop it to the validation area. It's developed in asp.net, vb.net, jQuery and Ajax.
